Texts.Chs: 小心点，林子里有一些讨厌的虫子。
Texts.Eng: Careful out there. There are some nasty bugs in the woods.

Texts.Chs: 别忘了在你离开之前收集一些必需品，虽说我们没有太多可以提供给你的装备，但只要你需要，我们就会给你。
Texts.Eng: Don't forget to load up before you go. We don't have much, but feel free to take anything you might need.

Texts.Chs: 这是‘疯狂轰炸机’，它可以帮你找出进入的方法。
Texts.Eng: Tavish 'the mad bomber' DeGroot... he'll find a way to blow it up.

Texts.Chs: 猿族在树林里安排了暗哨，小心点！
Texts.Eng: The miniknog has outposts in the woods. Watch out for them!

Texts.Chs: 这地方真臭，我想快点离开这儿。
Texts.Eng: This place stinks. I want to be off this rock as soon as possible.

Texts.Chs: 我们会和塔维什一起出去，不过人太多或许会被猿族发现。
Texts.Eng: We'd have gone out with Tavish, but too big a group would that close to the facility would attract the miniknog's attention.

Texts.Chs: 我们是塔维什的后勤部队。
Texts.Eng: We're acting as the support team for Tavish.

Texts.Chs: 为什么猿族在这里造了这样的建筑？如果我是他们，我就会在这美丽的星球上好好地开个店子，而不是造这些毫无美感的玩意儿！
Texts.Eng: Why would the miniknog have a facility here anyway? If I were them, I'd pick a nice planet to set up shop, not this!
